titles.title: To direct the Secretary of Agriculture to complete a land exchange with Georgia Power Company.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition and Forestry.

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Oversight, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 3/16/1999--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain land in Georgia and make a specified payment to the Georgia Power Company in exchange for certain land within or near the Chattahoochee and the Oconee National Forests, Georgia.
